title: Problems of the Italian school system 2019
summary: A survey conducted in 2019 reveals that the largest groups of Italian respondents cheated on 2019 Violence either Italian a Lack_of_opportunities_to_enter_into_the_labor_market or Italian a Lack_of_funding_and_resources .

However , it was common to 2019 Italian strangers as well .

data.Response: Lack of opportunities to enter into the labor market
